description: Made to move with you, the Kuhl 9 in Kontour Flex Denim Straight Pant features a mid-high 9 in rise and high stretch fabric with a soft feel for superior mobility and comfort. Signature touches like a contoured waistband with drawcord and jean styling make this pant the perfect fit for everyday wear.
name: 9" Kontour Flex Denim Straight Pants, Reg - Womens
